idea-plugin.name: React QuickSwitch
idea-plugin.description: React QuickSwitch allows you to switch amongst files of one component efficiently, by just using one shortcut (default Alt + S). Supported extensions are tsx, ts, jsx, js, html, php, haml, jade, pug, slim, css, sass, scss, less, styl.
idea-plugin.change-notes: - Added support for jsx, tsx files (forked from React CLI QuickSwitch plugin)

action.description: Quickly switches between React files for one component, e.g. tsx, scss
